channel.title: Klipper on Blog

item.title: Klipper on an Ender 3
item.author: alberto@albertogrespan.com (Alberto Grespan)
item.description: This post will take you through the process of getting Klipper up and running from my experience of doing so on an Ender 3 Pro with some mods. I’m going to try to keep this post as up to date as possible while I learn/use new things. Whats Klipper? Klipper is a 3d-Printer firmware. It combines the power of a general purpose computer with one or more micro-controllers. â€” Klipper Website
